title: Purse, late 17th–early 18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Small envelope-shaped purse in green and white silk. Pattern in white silk is a symmetrical arrangement of a crown with confronted dolphins and three fleurs-de-lis above with stylized foliage borders. Lined with pink taffeta.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, late 17th–early 18th century.
late 17th–early 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: woven. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-55-5.
